text:
e="preserve">Thomas Allen Brown (May 24, 1937 – April 4, 2020), known also as Timothy Brown and Timmy Brown, was an American singer, professional American football player, and actor. He was born in Richmond, Indiana. He played Capt. Spearchucker Jones in "M*A*S*H". As a football player, he played for the Green Bay Packers, Philadelphia Eagles, and Baltimore Colts.
Brown died on April 4, 2020 in Palm Springs, California of dementia-related problems at the age of 82.
